query.name: com.txoof.brightspace.enroll.08_s_athl
query.sql:
SELECT distinct 'enrollment' as "type", 'UPDATE' as "action", 'S_'||STUDENTS.STUDENT_NUMBER as "child_code", 'Learner' as "role_name", 'co_ath_'||Gen.Name AS "parent_code"
FROM Students JOIN Gen ON Gen.cat='activity' WHERE Students.Enroll_Status = 0 and STUDENTS.GRADE_LEVEL >=5 AND PS_CustomFields.GetStudentsCF(Students.ID,Gen.Value) IS NOT NULL AND PS_CustomFields.GetStudentsCF(Students.ID,Gen.Value) >=1 AND Gen.Name LIKE '%Athletics - %'
